price: او دا خلك له يوې (سختې) كړيكې پرته د بل څه انتظار نه باسي چې بيا به د هغې لږ ځنډېدل هم نه وي.
arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
